about: I am a Computer Science Engineering graduate specializing in building AI-powered, cloud-enabled, and mobile-first solutions. With experience in Flutter app development, AI/ML integration, IoT automation, and cloud infrastructure, I focus on solving real-world problems with scalable and efficient systems. Currently pursuing advanced learning in Cloud Engineering, I aim to design robust, secure, and high-performance architectures for businesses.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science & Engineering
education.description: Graduated with a focus on Cloud Computing, Artificial Intelligence, Database Management Systems, and Networking. Completed multiple hands-on projects integrating AI/ML, IoT, and cloud platforms.

journey.title: Fladdra Pvt. Ltd - Lab Automation Intern
journey.description: Shipped a Raspberry Pi battery-swap prototype; aligned device, app, and server for real-time IoT automation.

journey.title: AIT, Thailand - AI/ML Intern
journey.description: Optimized MRI tumor models using knowledge distillation; boosted inference speed while retaining accuracy.

journey.title: Next: Cloud Engineer
journey.description: Aiming to build robust, secure, and scalable cloud infrastructure in a challenging, growth-oriented role.

projects.name: AI-Powered Healthcare App
projects.description: Developed a Flutter-based application integrating AI for MRI analysis to detect tumors and fractures, combined with personalized health and diet planning, resulting in a unified platform that reduced diagnostic workflow time by 40% and improved patient outcomes.

projects.name: AI-Based Movie Recommendation App
projects.description: Built a Flutter app using the IMDB API and a Best-First Search algorithm to deliver personalized movie recommendations from a 500,000+ film database, achieving 35% improved accuracy, sub-1.2s response times, and a seamless mobile experience with dynamic filters for genre, year, and rating.

projects.name: Room Booking System
projects.description: Created a Flutter application integrated with the Google Sheets API to streamline room booking for small facilities, featuring real-time availability tracking, automated conflict detection, and user-friendly date/time filters, reducing scheduling conflicts by 95% and cutting booking time by 50%.

projects.name: Billing System for Small Business
projects.description: Designed a Flutter app with Google Sheets API integration to manage over 8,000 billing records for small businesses, offering e-bill generation, customer/product management, and advanced analytics, reducing billing time by 60% and achieving 99.8% data accuracy.

projects.name: E-Call: Environmental App
projects.description: Developed an AI-driven Flutter app with Firebase integration, providing a CO2 emission tracker, seasonal calendar, and real-time environmental news, boosting community engagement and increasing user awareness by 50% through an intuitive mobile interface.
